snippet: A thief who has stolen from a variety of settings, including residential and office buildings, a restaurant and a bar, has so far evaded the police.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; investigators with New York City Police Dept's Grand Larceny Division are confounded by series of robberies in NoLIta and Midtown that some people suspect are being perpetrated by the same person, but seem to lack an obvious pattern.
lead_paragraph: A thief who has stolen from a variety of settings, including residential and office buildings, a restaurant and a bar, has so far evaded the police.

headline.print_headline: An Equal Opportunity Burglar Proves Difficult to Pin Down
headline.main: An Opportunistic Manhattan Burglar Proves Difficult to Pin Down
